description: Variation of condition No. 2 (Approved Drawings) and removal of conditions Nos. 4 (Lightwells), 7 (Basement Use), 9 (Arboricultural Method Statement), 11 (Construction Management Plan) and 13 to 15 (Car Parking Permit Restriction) of the planning permission reference: 2021/03272/FUL dated 2nd March 2022 for the "Conversion of the existing property nos. 133 and 135 along original party wall line to create a new self-contained maisonette at basement, ground and part of first floor level of no.135 (upper maisonette at no. 135 to remain unchanged); excavation of the front and part of the rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement at no. 135; alterations to the existing single storey rear extensions of both properties to include, replacement of existing sliding doors with new aluminium sliding doors to the rear, and replacement of existing roof glazing with new contemporary roof glazing; removal of the existing glazed roof to the side of the existing back addition at no.135. in connection with the formation of a courtyard; erection of a fence to subdivide the rear garden." Amendments sought to omit approved basement with lightwells and allow car parking permit eligibility.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
